int nroots (  double  a,
double  b,
double  c
) 
 

Number of real roots of a quadratic.

This procedure determines the number of real roots of a quadratic polynomial by examining its discriminant.

Parameters:
a coefficient of x-squared
b coefficient of x
c constant term
Returns:
the number of real roots of ax^2 + bx + c
